Guiscrcpy is an everyday app! I simply couldnt live without it, especially having to use two phones. I did have an issue with other guiscrcpy snaps since the update to Fedora 35. I installed this flatpak version. The phone needed to be recognized but once I approved, the window came up and started the emulator. Works perfect with multiple phones. Love the interface, nice dark theme as well! Great developer!

While I am happy to have this as an option, the floating windows that can control home, back, and etc. freak out and "stick" to the mouse. They follow your cursor, so to speak. I just leave that disabled, no big deal.

However, I wish there was a "rotate screen" button. I end up having to tilt my phone so that the screen goes portrait mode. I know there is a rotation drop down on the right of the GUI window but it doesn't make the screen portrait, it just completely rotates the screen so it's sideways in a portrait aspect ratio window. If that get's added, 5 stars!
